title: myself
description: I am a software developer with over 7 years experience in Javascript, Python, and C. I thrive with backend solutions, and I am proficient with frontend development.

accomplishment.title: Python Software Foundation Fellow
accomplishment.description: In August, 2019, I was inducted as a fellow of the PSF, in recognition of my contribution to the advancement of the language

accomplishment.title: PSF Grants Committee Member
accomplishment.description: In 2018, I was the first Ghanaian to sit as a voting member of the PSF grants committe

accomplishment.title: Co-organizer of the first-ever Pan-African conference in Ghana, Pycon-Africa
accomplishment.description: From the 6th to the 11th of August, 2019, I and my team made history be organising a successful conference in Ghana

accomplishment.title: Chair of The Python Software Community in Ghana
accomplishment.description: From 2017 to date, I am the first, and current chair of the Python Software Community in Ghana.

accomplishment.title: Pioneer of Space and Satellite Technology in Ghana
accomplishment.description: Fron 2012 to 2017, I had help make Ghana a space-faring nation by contributing technically to the success of several projects launched by my previous organisation
